Name

Crit Effect

Type
Split Open The target takes 1d6 persistent bleed damage.

Bludgeoning
Send 'em Reeling The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

Piercing
Shattered Jaw Until healed, the target is wounded 1 and can't speak, eat, drink, or make attacks with its jaws.

Slashing
Protective Charm You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and all saving throws until t he end of your next turn.

Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #8
